attributes.action: Get repeat perscriptions of Inhailers provided by the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that asthma, a hereditory condition passed from parent to child, should be covered by the NHS.  Usually a child grows out of asthma when they are around 14 years of age; however some don't.

Once an asmatic becomes 18 they have to pay in the region of £7-£9 for their inhailers and i think this is unfair;  other hereditory conditions are subsidised and covered by the NHS, why not asthma?
